'''Amurta''' is one of the [[Sumeru Akademiya#The Six Darshans|Six Darshans]], the six main schools of [[Sumeru Akademiya]]. Its specialty is biology.<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Khedive|s=1}}</ref><ref name="WDSD">{{Ref/Quest|Wherefore Did the Spiritstone Descend?}}</ref><ref group="Note">At 2:26 in ''Sumeru Preview Teaser 03'', the official Chinese subtitles call Amurta the {{lang|School of Life|zh=生论派}}, while the German and Spanish subtitles call it the {{lang|(School of) Biology|de=Lebenskunde|es=Escuela de Biología}}.</ref>

==Members==
*[[Khedive]]
*[[Tighnari]]

==Trivia==
*[[Anisa]] may be a member of this school: she displays an in-depth knowledge of biology by autopsying Kumi, is a member of the Oceanographic Society, and is close with Khedive (a member of Amurta).

===Etymology===
*Like the other Six Darshans, the name {{Lang|"Amurta"|zh=阿弥利多}}<ref name="WDSD" /> is derived from a {{w|Zoroastianism|Zoroastrian}} deity. Amurta is likely named after {{w|Ameretat}} (''Amurdad'' in Middle Persian), a goddess of immortality and plant life.
